# Repository Topics

This repository should be tagged with the following topics for discoverability:

- hardware-monitoring
- system-metrics
- machine-learning-dataset
- telemetry
- python
- gpu-monitoring
- cpu-monitoring
- predictive-maintenance
- open-source
- windows
- linux
- macos

To add these topics:
1. Go to https://github.com/Dex947/OptiMetrics
2. Click the gear icon next to "About"
3. Add the topics listed above
